game.name: Log.in
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 『Log.in』은 PC 화면을 조작해 이미지, 동영상, 각종 파일과 소프트웨어를 조사하는 미스터리 호러 게임입니다. PC 어딘가에는 감금된 소녀의 위치가 숨겨져 있으며, 당신의 조작에 따라 이야기와 그녀의 운명이 크게 달라집니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Log.in is a mystery-horror game where you explore a PC screen, digging through images, videos and files. Hidden somewhere in the system is the location of a girl being held captive. Your actions on the desktop will dramatically change the story and her fate.

reviewHighlights.text: this is a very good game especially if you have a friend to help you but it is very hard and therefore it is fun
เกมดีที่ถ้าไม่กด hint คงหาฉากจบเองไม่ได้
